comment: Ms. McCarter was one of the best teachers I had to start off college. She gives three essays over film analysis that are super easy. She gives you the freedom to pick what films you want to write about. She provides great feedback and is a pretty fair grader. Take her!!!

Ms. McCarter is so sweet and welcoming. There were three major papers as well as a final video essay based on our choice of movies. Although very easy, the class allowed me to solidify and strengthen my writing skills. I have learned a lot and I am very grateful that I have chosen this course.
She is such a great teacher. Her lectures are interesting and full of great examples. I wish more teachers were like her.

rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: One of my favorite professors, super nice and genuine
